paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the KCNH2 gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Prolonged APD50, APD90, and field potential duration (FPD) observed.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Both patch-clamp and multi-electrode array (MEA) experiments showed prolonged APD50, APD90 and field potential duration (FPD) in the homozygous as well as in the heterozygous VUS iPSC-CMs.

functional_data.summary: Prolonged action potential duration and decreased potassium current.

variants.additional_notes: Variant was created using CRISPR/Cas9 technology.
key_quotes: Garg et al. created a LQT2 iPSC-CM model harbouring the VUS p.(Thr983Ile) in the KCNH2 gene.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Demonstrated upregulation of hERG channel expression and increased potassium currents (IKr).
individual_records.evidence_sentence: They demonstrated an upregulation of the hERG channel expression and increased potassium currents (IKr) resulting in a shortening of the action potential.

functional_data.summary: Increased potassium currents leading to shortened action potential.

variants.additional_notes: Variant was compared to two control cell lines.
key_quotes: The first iPSC-CM model of SQTS was published by El-Battrawy et al. in 2018 where one patient cell line with a p.(Asn588Lys) mutation in the KCNH2 gene was compared to two control cell lines.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Similar electrophysiological and molecular results as the p.(Asn588Lys) variant.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Later, the same mutation and another KCNH2 p.(Thr618Ile) variant were modelled in iPSC-CMs and similar electrophysiological and molecular results were obtained.

functional_data.summary: Similar effects on action potential duration as the p.(Asn588Lys) variant.

variants.additional_notes: Variant was part of a study comparing multiple mutations.
key_quotes: Later, the same mutation and another KCNH2 p.(Thr618Ile) variant were modelled in iPSC-CMs and similar electrophysiological and molecular results were obtained.

tables_processed.table_caption: Overview of iPSC-CM models of inherited cardiac arrhythmias.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant KCNH2 variants were extracted with detailed penetrance data.
